  • Constructor Details

    • ResourcePackServer

      public ResourcePackServer(String address, int port, boolean required)
      Parameters:
      address - The IP address to host the web server on.
      port - The port to host the web server on.
      required - If players are required to accept the resource pack. If true, players who deny the pack will be kicked.

    • ResourcePackServer

      public ResourcePackServer(String address, int port, boolean required, ResourcePack pack)
      Parameters:
      address - The IP address to host the web server on.
      port - The port to host the web server on.
      required - If players are required to accept the resource pack. If true, players who deny the pack will be kicked.
      pack - A ResourcePack to serve the players who join the server.

  • Method Details

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Returns:
      The port that the server is hosted on.

    • getAddress

      public String getAddress()
      Returns:
      The IP address that the server is hosted on.

    • getServer

      public HttpServer getServer()
      Returns:
      The HttpServer that is being hosted.

    • getResourcePack

      public ResourcePack getResourcePack()
      Returns:
      The ResourcePack that is being served to Players.

    • isRequired

      public boolean isRequired()
      Returns:
      If the resource pack is required to join the server.

    • getPackUrl

      public String getPackUrl()
      Returns:
      The URL to directly download the resource pack.

    • getKickMessage

      public String getKickMessage()
      Returns:
      The kick message if the user declines a required resource pack.

    • setResourcePack

      public void setResourcePack(ResourcePack pack)
      Note: The resource pack URL will change after this is called.
      Parameters:
      pack - The new ResourcePack to server players.

    • setKickMessage

      public ResourcePackServer setKickMessage(String kickMessage)
      Sets the kick message for when a player declines a required resource pack.
      Parameters:
      kickMessage - The kick message to send.
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackServer instance.

    • isLoadedBy

      public boolean isLoadedBy(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Checks if a Player accepted or declined the resource pack. Note: This method may return incorrect values if a /reload is ran!
      Parameters:
      player - The Player to check
      Returns:
      If the provided Player accepted or declined the resource pack.
